summary: This document is a chain of emails from September 2021 between FBI agents, SDNY contractors, and a paralegal specialist, coordinating the collection and production of hotline tip records related to the Maxwell/Epstein investigations for the defense. It includes a detailed, anonymized tip from August 2020 alleging childhood sexual abuse and trafficking by the tipster's father, who is identified as a former recruiter for Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Lawrence
persons.role: Alleged former recruiter for Epstein, father of the anonymous tipster
persons.context: Named by an anonymous tipster as her father, a former recruiter for Jeffrey Epstein, who allegedly trafficked her and her siblings from childhood.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the investigation; hotline tips are being collected for her case. The anonymous tipster mentions her being around when the tipster met Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the investigation; hotline tips reference him. The anonymous tipster alleges her father was a former recruiter for him.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Mentioned by the anonymous tipster as someone she photographed with Virginia Giuffre in 2001.

persons.name: Virginia Giuffre
persons.context: Mentioned by the anonymous tipster as being in a 2001 photograph with Prince Andrew, which the tipster claims to have taken.

persons.name: Kimberly
persons.context: Mentioned in an email as having sent attachments containing follow-up information on hotline tips.

connections.description: The anonymous tipster alleges her father, Lawrence, was a former recruiter for Jeffrey Epstein.
The tipster alleges her father, Lawrence, trafficked and sexually abused her and her siblings from early childhood.
Both are central subjects of the investigation and hotline tip collection discussed in the emails.
The anonymous tipster references a photograph she took of Prince Andrew and Virginia Giuffre in 2001.

events.title: Photograph of Prince Andrew and Virginia Giuffre
events.description: The anonymous tipster claims she was the one who took a photograph of Prince Andrew and Virginia Giuffre.

events.title: Anonymous Hotline Tip Alleging Abuse
events.description: An anonymous caller reported to the hotline that her father, Lawrence, a former Epstein recruiter, trafficked and abused her and her siblings from age 4 or 5.

events.title: Document Serialization Deadline
events.description: Email states all hotline tip records had been serialized by this date, with a new lead arriving on 9/23/21.

locations: 1 Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: An anonymous 2020 hotline tip alleges a man named Lawrence, an attorney in Tarpon Springs, FL, was a former recruiter for Jeffrey Epstein who trafficked his own children.
The tipster, who was 28 in 2020, claims the abuse began at age 4 or 5 and that she took the famous 2001 photograph of Prince Andrew and Virginia Giuffre.
FBI and SDNY personnel were actively coordinating in late 2021 to collect and serialize all hotline tip records for production to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team.
The document reveals a systematic process for logging and tracking tips (via serial numbers) received by the FBI and SDNY related to the Epstein/Maxwell investigations.
The email chain indicates some tip records originated with the SDNY and were forwarded to the FBI, requiring coordination to ensure all were accounted for.
